divs: Sighting DetailsI was in bed at the time. I only remember three beings by my side in a room. A smaller being was on top of me. They communicated that they wanted me to hug it. So I did. Then it held me too tight. i tried to get it off me. I felt very strong and threw him off of me, He came back again. At that time, I was scared. That is all I remember. When I woke up and tried to remember what happened, I felt that they wanted me to nurture that being. I have been abducted many times before over my lifetime. I have been in contact telepathically with aliens as well. I have also seen ufos and aliens in the past.
Summary: being taken to a room that was made of steel or some type of metal
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Powell River
There were no other sightings in Powell River on or around May 3rd 2013
